s: The Looft Lighter I offers the quickest, safest and cleanest way to light your grill or fireplace. It starts your fire in 60 seconds with superheated air only – whether it be charcoal, briquettes or logs. No gas, no flame and no need for lighter fluids. Simply put: The perfect match

I've tried every type of charcoal starting method, and a heat gun wins hands down! You're up to temperature in 5 minutes, vs. 20-30 minutes for any other method. If the Looftlighter guys can fix their durability problems and drop the price a bit, I think they'll have a winner.

t: Amazon.com : Looftlighter Classic - Electric Charcoal Starter & Fire Lighter, Superheated Air Technology, 1300°F in 60 Seconds, for BBQ Grills, Smokers & Fireplaces : Outdoor Grill Lighting : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: A family member recommended this Looftlighter for our Kamado Joe Jr. grill. I balked at the price, but after using starter blocks and another brand electric lighter, I decided to give the “real deal” a try. I am not sorry. This is a wonderful product to start a charcoal fire.
